title: I want to quit League but i came to far
body: Iv'e been playing League since the beginning of Season 3 and i loved this game even in the though matches it was fun putting up a fight.But now at the end of Season 4 the Toxcity of the game (Flamers/Trolls/Feeders/AFKS/"Laggers" and the ones that only have 15 minutes to play) im sick of it. iv'e lost passion for this game hell im playing Smite and im enjoying it alot more but i keep coming back to League that the fact is ive spent quite a bit of money on RP and ive wasted 900 hours of my life on this game. Im thinking wither or not i should stick around for Season 5 or not. Any Tips on how to break the addiction?  {{item:3070}}
